skill.name: behaviors.skills.primitives.DecontaminateAreas
skill.description: For an agent to know how to decontaminate a set of areas. Areas are visited in the order of the list.

parameter.name: areas
parameter.description: A list of areas to decontaminate.

parameter.name: equipNRBCProtection
parameter.description: If this parameter is set tot 'false', agent won't equip itself with NBC protection to decontaminate the given areas.

link.name: reach
link.description: To go to a populated area.

link.name: decontaminate
link.description: To enact the decision to "decontaminate" an area.

link.name: selfprotect
link.description: To take all necessary steps to selfProtect against NRBC contamination or intoxication.

feedback.name: decontaminated
feedback.description: Sent upon completion of the simulation action.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when all "areas" have been visited.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if the set of "area" is empty (no area to act on).
